original_text: Then Death and Hades were thrown into the lake of fire. This is the second death, the lake of fire.
korean_text: 사망과 음부도 불못에 던져지니 이것은 둘째 사망 곧 불못이라

sentences.original_text: Then Death and Hades were thrown into the lake of fire.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사망과 음부가 불의 호수에 던져졌습니다.
